supplier_card.id AS id, supplier_card.createdAt AS createdAt, supplier_card.updatedAt AS updatedAt, supplier_card.isEnable AS isEnable, supplier_card.nameCn AS nameCn, supplier_card.nameEn AS nameEn, supplier_card.logo AS logo, supplier_card.website AS website, supplier_card.country AS country, supplier_card.cityIndex1 AS cityIndex1, supplier_card.cityIndex2 AS cityIndex2, supplier_card.cityIndex3 AS cityIndex3, supplier_card.cityIndex4 AS cityIndex4, supplier_card.cityIndex5 AS cityIndex5, supplier_card.addressPrefix AS addressPrefix, supplier_card.addressDetail AS addressDetail, supplier_card.postalCode AS postalCode, supplier_card.hotline AS hotline, supplier_card.lever AS lever, supplier_card.isAuth AS isAuth, supplier_card.isLock AS isLock, supplier_card.status AS status, supplier_card.contactJson AS contactJson, supplier_card.slideshow AS slideshow, supplier_card.businessScopeJson AS businessScopeJson, supplier_card.descriptionInfo AS descriptionInfo, supplier_card.serviceProcessInfo AS serviceProcessInfo, supplier_card.qualificationInfo AS qualificationInfo, supplier_card.configJson AS configJson, supplier_card.currentId AS currentId, supplier_card.applicationId AS applicationId, supplier_card.creatorCompanyId AS creatorCompanyId, supplier_card.creatorCompanyName AS creatorCompanyName
mapper.update:
UPDATE supplier_card
createdAt = #{createdAt},
updatedAt = #{updatedAt},
isEnable = #{isEnable},
nameCn = #{nameCn},
nameEn = #{nameEn},
logo = #{logo},
website = #{website},
country = #{country},
cityIndex1 = #{cityIndex1},
cityIndex2 = #{cityIndex2},
cityIndex3 = #{cityIndex3},
cityIndex4 = #{cityIndex4},
cityIndex5 = #{cityIndex5},
addressPrefix = #{addressPrefix},
addressDetail = #{addressDetail},
postalCode = #{postalCode},
hotline = #{hotline},
lever = #{lever},
isAuth = #{isAuth},
isLock = #{isLock},
status = #{status},
contactJson = #{contactJson},
slideshow = #{slideshow},
businessScopeJson = #{businessScopeJson},
descriptionInfo = #{descriptionInfo},
serviceProcessInfo = #{serviceProcessInfo},
qualificationInfo = #{qualificationInfo},
configJson = #{configJson},
currentId = #{currentId},
applicationId = #{applicationId},
creatorCompanyId = #{creatorCompanyId},
creatorCompanyName = #{creatorCompanyName},
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE supplier_card SET isEnable = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE supplier_card SET isEnable = FALSE WHERE id = #{id}
